name: Neo Contra
description: Neo Contra (ネオコントラ Neo Kontora) is the tenth video game in the Contra series by Konami. It was developed by Team Neo Kijirushi, a group of staff members within Konami Computer Entertainment Tokyo, and released for the PlayStation 2 in 2004. The game is a direct follow-up to Contra: Shattered Soldier, since it is a multidirectional shooter and is a departure from the traditional scrolling shooter formula from previous games. It was the first game in the series to receive an ''M'' rating from the ESRB.
